title.rendered: JOIN THE TEAM THAT MAKES THE VISION WORK

content.rendered:
Basically the team has been the very yard stick wherein the vision for the invasion for souls was formed from the onset in a bid to establish an institution and a rock which is formed to take the words of God to a greater height .

Locally, through the Apostle’s Ministration the set Vision has always been to set a standard based on his calling, even as he commenced in Lagos, with his calling to be a prophet of God and the word of God that he should go back to his home town and establish the headquarters of the House of God, one which he harkened unto.

Apostle Johnson Suleman with the Challenge he was faced with, as at the time never gave up, but waxed stronger, with the determination to fulfill his charge which was basically to take the word of the Almighty God of Host, to the nook and crannies of the world.

Meanwhile, his drive to achieve this aim is borne out of his desire through Celebration Television Network Limited and the Publishing house; Hosanna Publisher which have contributed immensely towards the propagation of the words of God via the media.

Meanwhile, based on this drive, there is the need for all well-meaning Christians, to sow into the ministry and partner with the ministry media force, Celebration Television Network Company and the drive aimed towards achieving the move and the work of God.
